about.title: About Oranit.biz
about.subtitle: A community hub connecting residents, businesses, and local life.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: Oranit.biz exists to strengthen our community by making it easier for residents to discover local businesses, connect with neighbors, and participate in community life. We believe in supporting local commerce, fostering meaningful connections, and building a more vibrant, inclusive Oranit for everyone.

values.communityDesc: Everything we do centers around making Oranit stronger and more connected.
values.localFirstDesc: Support local businesses and keep resources within our community.
values.bilingualDesc: Serving both English and Hebrew speakers to include everyone.
values.trustDesc: Moderated content and verified businesses you can rely on.

items.title: The Idea
items.body: Born from a simple question: how can we make it easier for Oranit residents to support each other and local businesses?

items.title: Building Together
items.body: With input from residents and business owners, we designed a platform that serves the real needs of our community.

items.title: Launch
items.body: Oranit.biz went live, bringing together the business directory, community events, and marketplace in one place.

items.title: Growing Every Day
items.body: Today, we're constantly improving based on your feedback, adding new features, and helping Oranit thrive.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.body: At Oranit.biz, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.body: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
items: Name and contact information when you register a business or contact us
Business details and photos if you list a business
Communications and feedback you send to us

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.body: We use the information we collect to operate and improve Oranit.biz, display business and event listings, facilitate community connections, respond to inquiries, and send relevant updates about the platform.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.body: We do not sell your personal information. We share business listing information publicly on the platform as intended. We may share information with service providers who help us operate the platform, and when required by law.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access and review your personal information
Request deletion of your account and data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at contact@oranit.biz.

seo.title: Privacy Policy - Oranit.biz
seo.description: Learn how Oranit.biz collects, uses, and protects your personal information and privacy.

intro.title: Agreement to Terms
intro.body: By accessing and using Oranit.biz, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the platform.

use.title: Acceptable Use
use.body: You agree to use Oranit.biz only for lawful purposes and in accordance with community guidelines. You must not:
items: Post false, misleading, or fraudulent information
Violate any local, national, or international laws
Harass, abuse, or harm other users or businesses

listings.title: Business and Event Listings
listings.body: Business owners are responsible for the accuracy of their listings. Oranit.biz reserves the right to remove any listing that violates our guidelines or terms. We do not guarantee the accuracy of third-party content.

content.title: User Content
content.body: You retain ownership of content you post, but you grant Oranit.biz a license to display and distribute that content on the platform. You are responsible for ensuring you have the rights to any content you upload.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.body: Oranit.biz is provided 'as is' without warranties. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the platform, interactions with other users, or reliance on listed businesses.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.body: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

Yes, browsing listings, events, and using the marketplace is completely free for residents. Basic business listings are also free.

items.q: How do I change the language?
items.a: Click the language toggle icon in the top navigation to switch between English and Hebrew.

items.q: How do I add my business?
items.a: Click 'Add My Business' in the navigation or visit the For Businesses page. Fill out the form with your business details and submit for review.
Most business listings are reviewed and approved within 24-48 hours.

items.q: Can I edit my business listing later?
items.a: Yes, contact us with your business name and the changes you'd like to make. We're working on a self-service dashboard for business owners.

items.q: How do I post a community event?
items.a: Visit the What's On page and look for the 'Post Event' option, or contact us with your event details and we'll help you list it.
Yes, community events, workshops, and local gatherings can be posted for free.
